title: Farm Finger FamilyEP155Song for KidsBebefinn Nursery Rhymes

tasks.task: Searching for and locating farm animals
subtasks: Running around while calling out animal names (e.g., "Cow Finger, Cow Finger, where are you?")
Mimicking animal sounds (e.g., moo, quack, ba-ba-ba, coink)
Singing nursery rhymes or phrases related to the game
Pretending to find animals and welcome them (e.g., "Here I am, here I am, how do you do?")

tasks.task: Playing a musical instrument (not explicitly mentioned but implied by the mention of "spur finger family" which may refer to a ukulele)
subtasks: Strumming a ukulele or similar instrument (as suggested by "spur finger" possibly referring to a style of playing)

tasks.task: Acting out roles of farm animals
subtasks: Wiggling fingers or adopting animal-like movements (e.g., mooinglike a cow)
Using hand gestures to mimic animal characteristics (e.g., quacking like a duck)

tasks.task: Interacting with a chicken prop or toy
subtasks: Mimicking a chicken's movements or sounds (if a physical chicken is present)
Holding a chicken finger toy or prop and moving it around (if part of the setup)

tasks.task: Attempting to find a missing pig
subtasks: Calling out "No?" and then responding when the pig is found ("Here I am, here I am")
Correcting oneself if the initial search is unsuccessful
Simulating discovery of the pig and its sound ("Coink, coink, coink")
